person.persName: Robert A. Johnson (New Orleans, Louisiana, cotton factor)

body.p: New Orleans, Louisiana, cotton factor. Kentucky native. Father of Marguerite Johnson and Robert Johnson. Cotton broker in New Orleans in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in New Orleans in 1860. Partner of the cotton factor firm of Bartley, Johnson & Co. in New Orleans with W. T. Bartley, Charles F. Johnson, James S. Lytle, and Polynice Prudhomme in 1861.
